abstract: A daily news digest e-mail for real estate bankers, brokers and lawyers starts up.
snippet: A daily news digest e-mail for real estate bankers, brokers and lawyers starts up.
lead_paragraph: If you read last week’s profile of Mark D. Madoff, you learned that he had been quietly — and anonymously — publishing a popular online real estate newsletter called the Sonar Report. The daily e-mail, which charged $20 a month, compiled news from around the Internet for real estate bankers, brokers and lawyers into an easy-to-read, digestible format.

headline.main: Newsletter Picks Up Where Mark Madoff Left Off
